title: 918Secretary Sean Duffy: @CAGovernor & his state were caught red-handed after weeks of claiming they
content:
920 Secretary Sean Duffy: @CAGovernor & his state were caught red-handed after weeks of claiming they did nothing wrong. Now that we’ve exposed their lies, 17,000 illegally issued trucking licenses are being revoked.California must revoke every illegally issued CDL or I will pull $160M in federal funds. posted 3 hours ago by Mr_Rightside 61 comments award share download report block
61 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Krat 65 points 3 hours ago Did you get a liberal judges permission to pull that funding ?!? permalink award report block reply Grindelwald 20 points 3 hours ago Waiting for that. It seems that all these liberal judges are outing themselves and positioning to be impeached from office. permalink parent award report block reply MasterChief08 24 points 3 hours ago They'll never be impeached. Jailing or the rope for treason is the only way. permalink parent award report block reply Grindelwald 3 points 2 hours ago I do like the old ways permalink parent award report block reply mty_green_go 1 points 2 hours ago "Safe and effective"... just like new vaccines permalink parent award report block reply 0care 1 points 2 hours ago certainly no reoffending permalink parent award report block reply Standingoak 1 points 3 hours ago Did they allow so many licenses ? permalink parent award report block reply drattastic1 1 points 45 minutes ago Yup injunction from activist judge in 3..2.. permalink parent award report block reply Scot 49 points 3 hours ago CDLs are the tip of the iceberg. Hence, they had to issue a new REAL ID product.
